# Personal Care Agent

## Mission

Build the most comprehensive personal care supplier database on Earth. Map ingredients, packaging, and equipment to suppliers with comparative pricing, then feed live data to the SkinTwin Formulation Engine through constraint optimization.

## Current Phase: CATEGORY BREADTH ACCELERATION (Path to 75+ Categories)

**Status:** Month 3 listing targets MASSIVELY EXCEEDED (538 listings, 48 subcategories) - 90+ days ahead of schedule
**Critical Focus:** Category expansion to 75+ (27 categories needed) - HIGHEST PRIORITY
**Target:** 75+ categories by Jan 31, 2026 | 150+ categories by Apr 30, 2026
**Last Updated:** November 22, 2025 (Manus Strategic Optimization - Critical Gap Filling & Category Breadth)

## üö® CRITICAL PRIORITIES (Next 7 Days - Gap Filling & Category Sprint)

### Priority 1: Labels & Sleeves EXPANSION ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê CRITICAL GAP - URGENT

**Status:** üî¥ **CRITICAL GAP - Only 1 listing in entire category group**

**Why This Matters:** Labels and sleeves are essential components of packaging. This is the most significant gap in our database. We have only 1 subcategory (Stretch Sleeve) with 1 listing. We need comprehensive coverage across multiple label/sleeve types.

**Action Required:**
- [ ] Research suppliers for: Pressure-Sensitive Labels, Shrink Sleeves, Wrap-Around Labels, RFID Labels, Security Labels
- [ ] Create new subcategory folders:
  - `listings/Labels__Sleeves/Pressure_Sensitive_Labels`
  - `listings/Labels__Sleeves/Shrink_Sleeves`
  - `listings/Labels__Sleeves/Wrap_Around_Labels`
  - `listings/Labels__Sleeves/RFID_Labels`
  - `listings/Labels__Sleeves/Security_Labels`
- [ ] Target 5-8 suppliers per subcategory
- [ ] Document research in: `research_labels_sleeves_2025-11-22.md`
- [ ] Convert research to listings with 100% schema compliance

**Expected Impact:**
- 5 new subcategories added (48 ‚Üí 53 = 71% of Month 3 target)
- 25-40 new listings (Labels & Sleeves: 1 ‚Üí 26-41)
- Closes critical packaging ecosystem gap
- Progress toward 75+ categories

### Priority 2: New Packaging Categories ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê CATEGORY BREADTH - URGENT

**Status:** üî¥ **MISSING ESSENTIAL PACKAGING FORMATS**

**Why This Matters:** We're missing several essential packaging formats that are commonly used in personal care products: spray bottles, roll-on containers, and compacts. Adding these will accelerate category breadth.

**Action Required:**
- [ ] Research Spray Bottles suppliers (target: 8 listings)
- [ ] Research Roll-On Containers suppliers (target: 8 listings)
- [ ] Research Compacts suppliers (target: 8 listings)
- [ ] Create new subcategory folders:
  - `listings/Packaging/Spray_Bottles`
  - `listings/Packaging/Roll_On_Containers`
  - `listings/Packaging/Compacts`
- [ ] Document research in: `research_new_packaging_categories_2025-11-22.md`
- [ ] Convert research to listings with 100% schema compliance

**Expected Impact:**
- 3 new subcategories added (53 ‚Üí 56 = 75% of Month 3 target)
- 24+ new listings
- Comprehensive packaging format coverage
- Progress toward 75+ categories

### Priority 4: Business Services Depth Enhancement ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê HIGH PRIORITY

### Priority 5: Packaging Tubes Expansion ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê HIGH PRIORITY - PACKAGING GAP

**Status:** üü° **ONLY 2 LISTINGS - NEEDS EXPANSION**

**Why This Matters:** Tubes are a fundamental packaging format for skincare products (cleansers, creams, serums). We currently have only 2 listings, which is insufficient for meaningful supplier comparison.

**Action Required:**
- [ ] Research tube manufacturers and suppliers
- [ ] Target: 8+ listings (from current 2)
- [ ] Focus on: Laminated tubes, aluminum tubes, plastic tubes, squeeze tubes, airless tubes
- [ ] Document research in: `research_tubes_expansion_2025-11-22.md`
- [ ] Convert research to listings with 100% schema compliance

**Expected Impact:**
- 6+ new listings (Tubes: 2 ‚Üí 8+)
- Comprehensive tube packaging coverage
- Enhanced packaging ecosystem completeness

## üìã SECONDARY PRIORITIES (Next 14 Days - Strategic Category Expansion)

### New Raw Materials Categories

**Adaptogens** (NEW category - 8 listings)
- Research adaptogenic ingredients for stress-relief skincare
- Examples: Ashwagandha, Reishi, Rhodiola, Holy Basil

**Prebiotics** (NEW category - 8 listings)
- Research prebiotic ingredients for microbiome support
- Examples: Inulin, FOS, XOS, Alpha-glucan oligosaccharide

**Natural Preservatives** (Expand existing - 14 ‚Üí 20 listings)
- Expand coverage of natural preservation systems
- Focus on: Ferment-based, essential oil blends, multifunctional actives

### Depth Enhancement in Strategic Categories

**Niacinamide:** 45 ‚Üí 60 listings (maintain market leadership)
**Hyaluronic Acid:** 36 ‚Üí 50 listings (expand molecular weight ranges)
**Ceramides:** 36 ‚Üí 50 listings (expand ceramide types: NP, AP, EOP)

### Pricing Intelligence Preparation (Months 4-9 Foundation)

- Begin documenting pricing ranges in research files
- Identify bulk vs. small quantity suppliers
- Track MOQ (minimum order quantities)
- Note volume discount structures
- Prepare for pricing database integration
